verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> you a <S%H430>god<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> shall be your <S%H5030>prophet.<s%>

You shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> that he <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of his <S%H776>land.<s%>
And I will <S%H7185>harden<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> my <S%H226>signs<s%> and my <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

But <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to you, that I may <S%H5414>lay<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H6635>armies,<s%> and my <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8201>judgments.<s%>

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I <S%H5186>stretch<s%> forth my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3318>bring<s%> out the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> them.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> they.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> when they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5414>Show<s%> a <S%H4159>miracle<s%> for you: then you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> your <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8577>serpent.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> down his <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H8577>serpent.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> men and the <S%H3784>sorcerers:<s%> now the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> they <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> in <S%H3651>like<s%> <S%H3651>manner<s%> with their <S%H3858>enchantments.<s%>

For they <S%H7993>cast<s%> down <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and they <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H8577>serpents:<s%> but <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> up their <S%H4294>rods.<s%>
And he <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> that he <S%H8085>listened<s%> not to them; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3515>hardened,<s%> he <S%H3985>refuses<s%> to let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>

<S%H3212>Get<s%> you to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> <S%H2009>see,<s%> he <S%H3318>goes<s%> out to the <S%H4325>water;<s%> and you shall <S%H5324>stand<s%> by the <S%H2975>river's<s%> <S%H8193>brink<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> he <S%H7125>come;<s%> and the <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H2015>turned<s%> to a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> shall you <S%H3947>take<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to him, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> till <S%H5704>now<s%> <S%H3541><s%> you would not <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> In <S%H2063>this<s%> you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> with the <S%H4294>rod<s%> that is in my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in the <S%H2975>river,<s%> and they shall be <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

And the <S%H1710>fish<s%> that is in the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> and the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall <S%H887>stink;<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3811>loathe<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H2975>river.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> your <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> on their <S%H5104>streams,<s%> on their <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> and on their <S%H98>ponds,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4723>pools<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> that they may <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> and that there may be <S%H1818>blood<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> both in vessels of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and in vessels of <S%H68>stone.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded;<s%> and he <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up the <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> that were in the <S%H2975>river,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> that were in the <S%H2975>river<s%> were <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

And the <S%H1710>fish<s%> that was in the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H4191>died;<s%> and the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H887>stank,<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H2975>river;<s%> and there was <S%H1818>blood<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> with their <S%H3909>enchantments:<s%> and <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did he <S%H8085>listen<s%> to them; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did he <S%H7896>set<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1571>also.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H2658>dig<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about the <S%H2975>river<s%> for <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink;<s%> for they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H2975>river.<s%>
And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> the <S%H2975>river.<s%>
